snippet.title: trailer: Radiator 2, trilogy of short experimental games about intimacy
snippet.description:
game by Robert Yang (http://debacle.us)
music is "Cabbage Sea" by Liz Ryerson (https://ellaguro.bandcamp.com/)

What if sex in games was something we performed as players, instead of something we obtained? What do sex mechanics look like? How can we convey or embody intimacy in games? Well, that's what Radiator 2 tries to do.

Get it (free, pay what you want) on itch.io: https://radiatoryang.itch.io/radiator2
